GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v5.10.155
GSD.description:
HID: hyperv: fix possible memory leak in mousevsc_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.155 by commit 8597b59e3d22b27849bd3e4f92a3d466774bfb04, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit 74c4fb058083b47571a4f76dcfce95085f2d8098. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: hyperv: fix possible memory leak in mousevsc_probe()
OSV.details:
